name: Der Schuh des Manitu
description:
Der Schuh des Manitu is an arcade game developed by Soft Enterprises. It came out on 01-10-2002. Blackstar Interactive published the game.
You can play Der Schuh des Manitu on PC.
It was produced by Michael Herbig and Michael Wolf. It was directed by Michael Herbig. Ralf Wengenmayr scored the game.
